newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Freight Links to build plastics factory.
newsitem.headline: Freight Links to build plastics factory.

text.p: Freight Links Express Holdings Ltd said on Wednesday its subsidiary, S E Plastics Technology Pte Ltd, would lease an additional 6,960 sq m piece of land from Jurong Town Corporation (JTC).

It said in a statement the land would be used with an adjacent plot already leased from JTC in February 1996 to build a factory to produce plastic pallets for warehousing and manufacturing industries.
The plant, due to begin production in January 1998, is not expected to have any material impact on the group's profitability in fiscal 1997.

Freight Links also said Group Financial Controller and Company Secretary Ong Chong Hock had resigned and that its subsidiary, Concord Travel Agency Pte Ltd, had ceased operations. It did not give any reasons.
